name: Trouble Comes Twice
description:
Trouble Comes Twice is a bisexual romcom visual novel. The two playable protagonists, twins Hazel and Jace, are twenty-somethings who have never been in a serious relationship before. Like any other not-so-rational person, they decide to turn this into a bet! Whichever twin scores a boyfriend or girlfriend first wins!


With four romance options, eight different routes, and 16 endings - Trouble Comes Twice promises hours of comedy, angst and fluff.

features:

  • 2 Playable Protagonists: Jace and Hazel both have their own personalities, interests and dynamics with the love interests

  • 4 Love Interests and 8 Routes: Romance cute girls and boys as both twins

  • 16 Endings: Do you prefer a more dramatic happy ending or a more romantic one? After finishing both endings for a route, you unlock an epilogue!

  • Over 40 CG Illustrations

  • 9 Chibi Illustrations
